ED_Title: Provisional  programme of work and timetable of the First Committee for 2022
ED_DecisionText: At its 45th plenary meeting, on 6 December 2021, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the First Committee, (Footnote: A/76/452, para. 5)  approved the provisional programme of work and timetable of the Committee for 2022, as set out in the annex to the report of the Committee.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
